Description_lang: The caster periodically creates a zone of Volatile Magma at the location of a nearby player, inflicing Fire damage to all players within $164774A1 yards of the impact.  After 2 seconds, the zone becomes so Volatile that it will explode if any creature comes in contact with it, inflicting Fire damage to all of the caster's enemies.If a player triggers this explosion they will take $164804s1% more damage from further explosions. If a creature triggers this explosion then all of the caster's enemies are affected in this manner.
